Title: Wrath
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the graphic novel), Tony Moore (based on the graphic novel), Charlie Adlard (based on the graphic novel), Scott M. Gimple, Angela Kang, Matthew Negrete
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Danai Gurira
Plot: The communities join forces in the last stand against the Saviors as all-out war unfolds.
